page.title: 03COMMUNITY LIFE
page.content: The village has a close community spirit which is kept alive by annual events. June - village sports and flower and vegetable show. August - flower and vegetable show. Christmas - pantomime (with mny local adults and children taking part) brings many families from the outlying farms and villages into Winston. The village boasts a badmintonj club which enters regular competitions for the area championships. The village hall is also used by the Young Farmers Club, members of the local Womens' Institute and the Wine Club.
